mapper.select: SELECT fms.priority priority,fms.entnyname entnyname,fms.unit unit,fms.mid `mid`,sd.todayaccomplish todayaccomplish,(sd.todayaccomplish/fms.plannedvolume*100+'') finishratio,sd.describe 'describe',sd.dayScheduid dayScheduid FROM (SELECT fm.priority priority,fm.entnyname entnyname,fm.unit unit,fm.codeno codeno,ms.plannedvolume plannedvolume,ms.mid MID,ms.date DATE FROM t_f_maintenance fm LEFT JOIN t_month_schedule ms ON fm.maintenanceid = ms.fid WHERE ms.date = #{date}) fms LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_s_daystatement WHERE DAY = #{day}) sd ON sd.monthscheduleid = fms.mid ORDER BY fms.codeno ASC
